text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service

The information formerly in IRM 10.2.10, is moved to new IRM 10.6.1. IRM 10.6.1 will reflect the new and/or revised Executive Orders, Presidential Directives, Federal Continuity Directives (FCDs), and Department of Treasury policy and guidance which have been issued to implement changes to continuity operations related policy and directives for developing, implementing, and maintaining viable agency continuity programs and plans.
IRM 10.2.10 has been renumbered to IRM 10.6.1, Continuity Operations, Continuity Planning Requirements, to reflect changes in organizational structure and Homeland Security
IRM 10.2.10, dated September 25, 2008, is obsolete. The information is published in IRM 10.6.1, Continuity of Operations.
Richard L. Rodriguez Director, Office of Continuity Operations
